metadata.Title: CVE-2021-34432 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Mosquitto versions 2.07 and earlier, the server will crash if the client tries to send a PUBLISH packet with topic length = 0.

notes.Note: gianz> PoC: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=574141 (first message) The CVE indicates versions <= 2.0.7 as affected. However only versions >= 2.0.0 and <= 2.0.7 are vulnerable. No crash detected running the PoC against any previous version we support.

criterions.comment: mosquitto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
